title: Ping Spikes
body: FOr some reason in the past week i have randomly gotten ping spikes of usually 400 ms for as long as 10 minutes then goes down to my normal 46-48 for 5 then up to 400 again for another 5-10 mins. It's getting really annoying and i don't know why it's happening. It was fine last week at a constant 46-48 which is normal for me.  I'm thinking it might be something to do with the update 6.19 but i'm not sure. Help please.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
